div.head: 水腹脹滿
div.div: abdominal water distension and a feeling of fullness

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: abdominal water distension and a feeling of fullness

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shui zhang 水脹 , water distension. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry shu jiao 蜀椒： 主水腹脹滿，利小便 , “It controls abdominal water distension and a feeling of fullness , and frees urination”.
